name: Chop! Chop!
description:
You're having a friend for dinner. Time to prepare the greatest meal you'll ever cook. 

A brand new cooking simulation game, created for the #ue4jam Summer Jam by a team of three

All content was created during the jam excluding:

Font - Gwibble from 1001fonts.com

Sounds - 1 Song, Countdown Beep and Whoosh Noises from the Pro Sound Collection on the Unreal Marketplace
